metadata.title: CVE-2019-16115 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a stack-based buffer under-read could be triggered inIdentityFunction::transform in Function.cc, used byGfxAxialShading::getColor. It can, for example, be triggered by sending acrafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It allows an attacker to use acrafted PDF file to cause Denial of Service or possibly unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
